entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 11 February 2023
